data.title: Monthly MFT
data.meta_description: The Motor Fuel Tax (MFT) law was amended, effective July 1, 2019. There will now be two monthly MFT allotments. The original MFT will be distributed from the Motor Fuel Tax Fund (MFTF). The increased MFT will distributed from the Transportation Renewal Fund (TRF)
data.text: The Motor Fuel Tax (MFT) law was amended, effective July 1, 2019. There will now be two monthly MFT allotments. The original MFT will be distributed from the Motor Fuel Tax Fund (MFTF). The increased MFT will distributed from the Transportation Renewal Fund (TRF). For more information, see Circular Letter 2019-18.
